settings.title: What Is It?
settings.answer: Super Balm is a high strength, skin solution made with the finest, 100% natural ingredients, designed to keep skin looking and feeling it's very best, everyday.

settings.title: What is CBG?
settings.answer: CBG is the "mother" of CBD, working deeper to calm irritation and boost skin repair. While CBD soothes, CBG speeds up recovery for stressed skin.

settings.title: How do i use it?
settings.answer: Use sparingly in the morning and again at night time to help maintain healthy skin or as required on dry, irritated skin to sooth and repair.

settings.title: Will it get me high?
settings.answer: Absolutely not, CBD and CBD are non psychoactive compounds and when applied topically on the skin, the only effect is protection and healing for the skin.

settings.title: Is it safe for kids?
settings.answer: You must be over 18 to legally purchase CBD products in the UK. However, it is safe for kids and many of our customers feely use our balm on irritated skin as young as 6 months.

settings.title: Why does it works so well?
settings.answer: Use this text to share the answer to the question with your customers.

settings.title: How long will it last?
settings.answer: "It's powerful stuff, a little goes a very long way! A 50ml tin lasts me (Oliver) around 6 weeks with consistent use two to three times a day."

settings.title: It's legal, right?
settings.answer: Use this text to share the answer to the question with your customers.
